LanguageData.WAW.EliteLore: These are the elites among the mercenaries, they are equipped with weapons in a good quality, and serve as long as 3 days.
LanguageData.WAW.OutpostLore: Outposts are designed to help you colony at any time, though they cannot move from one tile to another, they are trustworthy defense forces.
LanguageData.WAW.VehicleLore: A squad equipped with ground vehicles.
LanguageData.WAW.PsyCasterLore: A group of mercenaries led by powerful psycasters from the shattered empire, they demand eltex as fees.
LanguageData.WAW.SkirmishEvent: A field battle is going on, you can destroy all three hostile warbands and claim rewards.
LanguageData.WAW.SiegeEvent: An enemy settlement is under siege, you can join the battle for rewards.
